page.title: 04Events BELMONT, Surrey.
page.content: In June part of Belmont Festival is held in the village in Station Road, which is closed to traffic for the day. Stalls line each side of the road and provide lots of fun. Some years a collection of veteran cars parades down the streets.Guides and Brownies often do some country dancing so do Morris Men. Fancy dress competitions are held too and the Mayoress presents the prizes. In the school hall are verse speaking and music, craft, flower arranging and cake making competitions.In the evening the winners give a concert.Other events such as drama productions and recitals in church form part of the festival. The church is sometimes decorated with flower arrangements too. Games and picnics are held on the Downs on Sunday.
